verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G816>looking<s%> steadfastly at the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>"Brothers,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G4176>lived<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> high <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G367>Ananias,<s%> <S%G2004>commanded<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G5180>strike<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2316>"God<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G5180>strike<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> you <S%G2867>whitewashed<s%> <S%G5109>wall!<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Do <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2753>command<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to be <S%G5180>struck<s%> contrary to the <S%G3891>law?<s%>"
<S%G1161>Those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> "Do you <S%G3058>malign<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s high <S%G749>priest?<s%>"

<S%G5037><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> "I <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> high <S%G749>priest.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2046><s%> 'You shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2046>speak<s%> <S%G2560>evil<s%> of a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>'"

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G2076>were<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> he cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G435>"Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees.<s%> Concerning the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> I am being <S%G1473>judged!<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G2980>said<s%> <S%G4714>this,<s%> an argument <S%G1096>arose<s%> between the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4128>assembly<s%> was <S%G4977>divided.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G4523%G99999>Sadducees<s%> say <S%G3004>that<s%> there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> all of <S%G297>these.<s%>

<S%G1161>A<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> clamor <S%G1096>arose,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> some of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> stood <S%G450>up,<s%> and <S%G1264>contended,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2313>let<s%>'s <S%G3361>not<s%> fight against <S%G2313>God!<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4714>argument<s%> <S%G1096>arose,<s%> the commanding <S%G5506>officer,<s%> <S%G2125>fearing<s%> <S%G3361>that<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> would be torn in <S%G1288>pieces<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G4753>soldiers<s%> to go <S%G2597>down<s%> and <S%G726>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by <S%G726>force<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>barracks.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1966>following<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2186>stood<s%> by <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2293>"Cheer<s%> <S%G3972>up,<s%> Paul, <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> you have <S%G1263>testified<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4160>banded<s%> <S%G4963>together,<s%> and <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> under a <S%G332>curse,<s%> saying <S%G3004>that<s%> they <S%G5315>would<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3739>they<s%> had <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> There <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> people <S%G3588>who<s%> had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4945>conspiracy.<s%>

<S%G3748>They<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> "We have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> under <S%G3739>a<s%> great <S%G331>curse,<s%> to <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> we have <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G1718>inform<s%> the commanding <S%G5506>officer<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he should <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> were going to <S%G1231>judge<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4012>case<s%> more <S%G199>exactly.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> comes <S%G1448>near.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>'s <S%G79>sister<s%>'s <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of their lying in <S%G1749>wait,<s%> and he <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>barracks<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G520>"Bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the commanding <S%G5506>officer,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G3767%G99999>So<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the commanding <S%G2532>officer,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3972>"Paul,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> and asked <S%G2065>me<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G2980>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> commanding <S%G5506>officer<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G402>going<s%> <S%G2596>aside,<s%> <S%G4441>asked<s%> him <S%G2398>privately,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> it <S%G3739>that<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3427>me?<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> He <S%G3754>said,<s%> "The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G3704>to<s%> bring <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> intending to <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G3195>more<s%> <S%G199>accurately<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3982><s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3982>yield<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> lie in <S%G1748>wait<s%> for <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> under a <S%G332>curse<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>to<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> have <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>Now<s%> they are <S%G2092>ready,<s%> looking <S%G4327>for<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4675>you.<s%>"

<S%G3767%G99999>So<s%> the commanding <S%G5506>officer<s%> <S%G630>let<s%> the young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G630>go,<s%> <S%G3853>charging<s%> <S%G1583>him,<s%> "Tell no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you have <S%G1718>revealed<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>He<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> to himself <S%G1417>two<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2090>"Prepare<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3704>to<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G2460>horsemen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> men armed with <S%G1187>spears,<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night.<s%>"

<S%G5037>He<s%> asked them to <S%G3936>provide<s%> <S%G2934>animals,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1913>on<s%> <S%G1295>one,<s%> and bring him <S%G1295>safely<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>
He <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G4023>like<s%> <S%G5179><s%> <S%G5126>this:<s%>
<S%G2804>"Claudius<s%> <S%G3079>Lysias<s%> to the most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G5344>Felix:<s%> <S%G5463>Greetings.<s%>

<S%G5126>"This<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was <S%G4815>seized<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G5259>about<s%> to be <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> when <S%G2186>I<s%> came <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G4753>soldiers<s%> and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> having <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G4514>Roman.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1014>Desiring<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>why<s%> they <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> I <S%G2609>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4892>council.<s%>

I <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3739>him<s%> to be <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> not to <S%G2192>be<s%> <S%G1462>charged<s%> with <S%G3367>anything<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>imprisonment.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G3195>I<s%> was <S%G3377>told<s%> <S%G5259><s%> <S%G2071>that<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3195><s%> lay in <S%G1917>wait<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G3992>sent<s%> him <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1824>immediately,<s%> <S%G3853>charging<s%> his <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to bring their <S%G3004>accusations<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>you.<s%> <S%G4517>Farewell.<s%>"

<S%G3767%G99999>So<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> <S%G2596>carrying<s%> out <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1299>orders,<s%> <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G494>Antipatris.<s%>

But <S%G1161>on<s%> the next <S%G1887>day<s%> they <S%G1439>left<s%> the <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3925>barracks.<s%>

<S%G3748>When<s%> they <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G325>delivered<s%> the <S%G1992>letter<s%> to the <S%G2232>governor,<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3936>presented<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1161>When<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%> had <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G1905>it,<s%> he asked <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1885>province<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2532>from.<s%> When he <S%G4441>understood<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> from <S%G2791>Cilicia,<s%> he <S%G5346>said,<s%>

"I will <S%G1251>hear<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> fully <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3854>arrive.<s%>" <S%G5037><s%> <S%G5346>He<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> be <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>'s <S%G4232>palace.<s%>
